Delta Sand 1973  

BETA 1

First of all i made this game to learn how to make games this is not Professional game , it's just Small game for my training Purposes.

This game inspired from the war in 6 Octobar 1973 Egyptian side only currently , 

Also i made this game for learning proposes i didnt thought it will turn to be mostly a game at the end,

i made it to learn the Art and i used too many of my first made models and Textures , sorry if their quality not good enough.

Min Requirements :-

at least core 2 due processor with 8500 GT + at minimum requirement

2 GIGA RAM

windows 7 or XP

best performance which tested on runs so smooth 

Core i7  920 @ 2.67 GHZ 

6 Giga RAM

windows 7 or XP

Controls :

E : Action Key

W , A , S , D : Control keys for movements

F : Toggle First person Mode and 3rd person mode (( Game is orignaly 3rd person So dont complain about missing Animations :P ))

G : Throwing Grenades 

Space : Jump

Left mouse Button : Fire

Right mouse Button : Toggle (zoom in , zoom out)

X : Throw current Weapon

C : crouch

J , K : Funny Emotions

Final hint : i hope u enjoy this , i know too many cinematics but what i can do just pay intention to them to see what u can do

                press ~ to see if there is any hint coz for some reason it dont pop up on the screen.

Save System : No Save System yet if there is one it will be in the next release , that is why u will start at begining of level after dieing.
